name: ZippCast: improved aesthetic with cleaner layout
description: This style greatly improves the overall appearance of ZippCast. This includes my "cleaner layout" user style, but also improves colouring and applies visual effects. I would say that this style increases usability beyond that of the cleaner layout alone.
additional_info:
By WillP. Feel free to modify and redistribute this (attribution preferable, but not necessary).

<u>Updates</u>
4/1/16: improved search suggestions
24/11/15: fixed differences with HTTPS
12/11/15: improved the notifications pages and community guidelines page
6/11/15: increased font size and padding in small subscribe buttons
1/10/15: original release
